This slide contains a code chunk.

```{r}
temps <- list(20.2, 22.3, 19.7, 25.0, 16.3)
max <- temps[[1]]
i <- 1
for (temp in temps) {
    if (max < temp){
        max = temp
    }
    i <- i + 1
}

print(paste0(max, " is largest number in the list"))

```
